text: Dr. Wubbo Johannes Ockels (28 March 1946 - 18 May 2014) was a Dutch physicist, mathematician and astronaut. He worked for the European Space Agency (ESA). In 1985, he was in a flight on a Space Shuttle (STS-61-A). This made him the first Dutch citizen in space. Ockels was born in Almelo, Netherlands. Ockels died from complications of kidney cancer on 18 May 2014 in Amsterdam, Netherlands, aged 68.Wubbo Ockels overleden, nos.nl, May 18, 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Astronauts Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:Dutch physicists Category:People from Overijssel
title: Wubbo Ockels
